subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] File posted. Weird one.
author: Robin Searcy Henson
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0169_01C8614A.317F2730

	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I hear it all!  I'm envious of your location and all the activity you're pi=
cking up.  Do you think some of these souls need help crossing over?

Robin=



  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: lisbyfarrum<mailto:lisby@earthli=
nk.net> 
  To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com<mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com> 
  S=
ent: Sunday, January 27, 2008 5:19 PM
  Subject: [EVP-ITC] File posted. Wei=
rd one.


  Gimme some opinions on this one, gang. The first part of the cl=
ip is
  the speed it can through at. The repeat is slowed by about 70 perce=
nt.
  I hear it as "Estep." I thought I had heard the word yes, so I ask,
 =
 "Yes?" Under my voice is the name "Andrew," then "I'm Stu." "Perfect."
  "=
No..??...asshole...fucking scared."

  Do you hear this as I do? I'm postul=
ating right now that because I
  live immediately across the street from a =
cemetery, and in a
  100-year-old sitting atop a 200+-year-old foundation a=
nd cellar, that
  perhaps local dead folk who haven't crossed are popping i=
n during
  sessions. The voice that said "fucking scared" I swear I heard i=
n
  another file in my folder saying "scared people."

  Ann
